alert.note: Alert for Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:19AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lancaster County through 945 AM EDT... At 919 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buford, or 7 miles east of Lancaster, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Elgin, Andrew Jackson State Park, USC Lancaster, Van Wyck, Irwin, Buford, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Bell Town Fire Station, Arrowood Estates, Tradesville, Camp Creek Fire Station, Antioch, Kirk Air Base, Forty Acre Rock Preserve, Taxahaw, Pleasant Hill, Kershaw Correctional Institution, Unity Fire Station and Lancaster Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
